# idsec_identity_user (Data Source)

The Identity service user data source. It reads the user information and metadata and is based on the ID of the user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_identity_user" "myuser" {
  username = "myuser@cyberark.cloud.12345"
}

data "idsec_identity_user" "myuser_by_id" {
  user_id = "MY_USER_ID"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `display_name` (String) Display name of the user
- `email` (String) Email of the user
- `last_login` (Attributes) Last login time of the user (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--last_login))
- `mobile_number` (String) Mobile number of the user
- `password` (String) Password of the user
- `suffix` (String) Suffix of the user
- `user_id` (String) User ID found by name
- `username` (String) User name to find the id for
